Mirum in modum A glimpse of Gods glorie and the soules shape. Davies, John, 1565?-1618.
[84] p.
Printed [by Valentine Simmes] for VVilliam Aspley, London : 1602.
Dedication signed: Iohn Dauies. In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-K⁴ L² . Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
